categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems star systems

nodes.text: The Churba system was in the Churba sector of the Mid Rim. It included eight planets. A battle of the Great Sith War was fought here.
The Churba system was home to Imperial Intelligence agent Kirtan Loor.
Four of the known eight planets are listed below:
The PC video game Star Wars: Rebellion mistakenly places the Churba sector and, consequently, the Churba system, in the Outer Rim.
